String.string: These Aren’t the Weapons We’re Looking For
For the federation.
Lok's followers are a jumbled mix, eh?
"I understand."
Take the pegasus from Velika to Chebika and meet Jakarian.
"I understand."
Find Kusbert on the road to the Tenebrous Mines.
"I understand."
Speak with Lupus on the Foreman's Outlook.
Eliminate the zombie slaves in the Halls of Gloom and collect any mementos.
"Let's go."
Deliver the dig journal to Ruanal, who is hiding in the Halls of Gloom.
Deliver the dig journal to Ruanal, who is hiding in the Halls of Gloom.
"I understand."
Go to Justicar Talfryn at the Reliquary Station in the Halls of Shadow. [Press to open your inventory and use Ruanal's teleportal scroll.]
"You've obtained an old hammer."
"You've obtained old scissors."
Use Talfryn's Teleport Scroll to go to Nemuro and investigate the cultists' weapon crates in the Halls of Shadow.
Destroy the cultists' arms crate in the Halls of Shadow.
Use Talfryn's Teleport Scroll and go to Jesper in the Halls of Utterdark.
Take the tools to Jesper at the Utterdark Outpost.
Take the tools to Jesper at the Utterdark Outpost.
